revised_title: A Year-long Study of Statical Experiments and Meteorological Observations on the Human Body
tldr: Dr. John Lining conducted a year-long study of statical experiments and meteorological observations on himself to investigate the influences of different seasons on the human body and the potential causes of epidemic diseases. The study involved daily weigh-ins, urine and perspiration measurements, and blood analysis, with the aim of providing a more accurate understanding of the changes in the human body during various seasons.
